segments.text: What a washing machine ! It ’ s getting worse today . Look ! Now it doesn ’ t work at all . I think I need a new one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here ’ s an ad . about a big sale of washing machine . Do you want to see it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course ! Let ’ s have a look . Great ! In my frame of mind , I ’ d like to but one today .
segments.speaker: S1
